word: H7493 - רָעַשׁ - râʻash - raw-ash - Make afraid

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - அதிர், குலுங்கு, அசை, அதிரப்பண்ணு, அசையப்பண்ணு, மூர்க்கங்கொள்
b) (Niphal) to be made to quake
2) to cause to spring or to leap (used of a horse)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to undulate (as the earth, the sky, etc.; also a field of grain), particularly through fear; specifically to spring (as a locust): - make afraid, (re-) move, quake, (make to) shake, (make to) tremble.
Cognate: H7493, H7494
